abstract.description: Software to extract the data for the browser-based event display for the CMS Experiment

links.description: More information on the format can be found at

methodology.description: The software produces the objects to be displayed. The configuration file https://github.com/cms-outreach/ispy-analyzers/blob/Run2011A/python/ISpy_AOD_Producer_cff.py defines the objects to write out, which is done in the corresponding cc files in the src directory. No event selection, apart from accepting only the validated runs, is applied.

relations.description: The output are files in json format such as

system_details.description: Use this code with the CMS Open Data VM environment

title: Software to extract the event display format from the CMS primary dataset for 2011 data taking

use_with.description: Use this with any of the CMS primary datasets for 2011 data taking

validation.description: Only the list of validated runs for 2011 data taking are accepted:
